title: Not letting me sign-up for pbe  (NA)
body: It gives me error code 500 with the IBlitzcrank. Can so one help me please?

replies.body:
Seeing an error code 500 when signing up for PBE is an issue we've been looking at. We don't currently have a fix for this, but some players have been able to work around this by using a VPN.

If you have any issues, feel free to hit me up!
